short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Adds keyboard navigation hotkeys to crosswords on https://freecrosswordpuzzles.com.au.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
DISCLAIMER:
This extension is in no way endorsed by or associated with the controlling entity of FreeCrosswordPuzzles.com.au. This extension has been made independently, for open source and free use. 

Source code can be found here: https://github.com/k-xvin/freecrosswordpuzzles-ext.

USAGE:
Adds keyboard navigation hotkeys to crosswords on https://freecrosswordpuzzles.com.au.
- Tab/Enter to move forward a clue
- Shift + Tab/Enter to move backward a clue
